title: PayWithAnon
author: PayWithAnon
content: Hello fellow bitcoiners!   Welcome to the official PayWithAnon Bitcointalk Thread!      Today we introduce the world to the Anon Virtual Visa® Card.     The Anon virtual card lets you spend over 5+ cryptocurrencies like cash online, worldwide.   Purchase an Anon Virtual Visa® Card with crypto to pay online worldwide anywhere Visa® cards are accepted,   cards are immediately available to spend.    Key Features:    Private: We will never ask for any identification or personal information    Unlimited: You can create as many Anon Virtual Cards you need to match your spending needs    High load limit: Send funds or receive funds from other Anon users, instantly    Send and Receive: You can load an Anon Card up to $1.000 USD each.    How it works    Create an account: Create an account with only your email, no additional information required.    Fund your balance: Fund your credit balance with over 5+ cryptocurrencies, crypto will be automatically converted to USD.    Create A Card & Pay: Create a card in one click, cards are immediately available to spend. Use Anon cards to pay everywhere Visa cards are accepted, worldwide.   Check it out today: www.paywithanon.com
